Package com.ae2dms.Manager

Class PlayerInfo

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.Manager.PlayerInfo
public class PlayerInfo
extends java.lang.Object

The Class PlayerInfo defines the playerInfo structure. Defines some fields and methods that related to player info.
